jd: Dear Consultant,How are you doing well!My name is Shujath Ali and I am working as a Lead Talent Acquisition at Panzer Solutions LLC.We deal with US IT and non-IT recruitment services. We have the below opening with our preferred client,let me know if you are available & interested in this position. If interested please share a copy of your resume and best time, number to reach.Role: Infrastructure Project Manager Location : Austin, TX --HybridDuration: Long Term Please share only Local profiles. Client will not consider non locals, Austin local preferred. Job Description8+ Years: Experience in delivering network projects, and products in a highly technical dispersed multi-team environment (of those 8 years, we would like at least 5 in Network project management).8+ Years: Experience to engage multiple technical teams to drive consistent expectations towards Project goals.8+ Years: Knowledge of Network Infrastructure.8+ Years: Possess strong verbal and written skills in communicating with peers and different levels of users including executive staff.8+ Years: Skilled in facilitating large group meetings with internal and external resources.8+ Years: Skilled in collaborating with the technical and functional teams to develop the Technical Specification and other documents need in support of the solution.8+ Years: Experience in implementing Enterprise Systems Integration Preferred Skills and Qualifications:Experience with SDWAN projectsExperience with one or more of the State of Texas government agenciesExperience with multivendor and professional services.PMP certification is a plus.
